name: Illusionary blast
description: Focus your madness wavelength into a converging beam, dealing damage to all enemies in the path.

name: Wavelength manipulation (Insight)
description: Normalize your mind waves to increase your brainpower as long as active, draining mental energy.  Cast again to toggle OFF.

name: Wavelength manipulation (Mental fortitude)
description: Normalize your mind waves to clear existing mental impurities and resist them, draining mental energy.  Cast again to toggle OFF.
//: Udonge, like any other GYOKUTO_SPECIES , should in fact be immune to mental effects. However, this is more interactive

name: Wavelength manipulation (Perception)
description: Manipulate incoming electromagnetic waves to increase your perception for a short time, draining mental energy.  Cast again to toggle OFF.

name: Wavelength manipulation (Stealth)
description: Manipulate outgoing electromagnetic waves to turn yourself invisible for a short time, draining mental energy.  Cast again to toggle OFF.
//: Ideally, this should be a short ranged stealth, say 8 - 10 tiles only, with a change for her to not be detected past that point
